title: Love Where You Live.
map_address: 5250 Stewart Ave near Nellis Blvd & Stewart Ave
posting_body: ['Monterra Apartments in Las Vegas, NV', 'The staff at Monterra Apartment Homes invites you to visit our beautiful apartment homes for rent in Las Vegas NV, conveniently located near all Las Vegas has to offer.', 'Our friendly and outgoing staff, look forward to helping you make Monterra your new home.', 'Schedule your tour today.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 70', 'OR Text', '70', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 938 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Cable Ready', '- High Speed Internet Available', '- Walk in Closets', '- Air Conditioning', '- Vaulted Ceiling', '- Heating', '- Dishwasher & Garbage Disposal', '- Washer/Dryer', '- Balcony / Patio', '- Smoke Free', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness Center', '- Storage Units', '- Swimming Pool & Spa', '- Clubhouse', '- BBQ Grills / Picnic Areas', '- Gated Community', '- Business center', '- Wheelchair Access', '*Select units only', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Monterra Apartments', '5250 Stewart Ave, Las Vegas, NV, 89110', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'CPfoM54vJGtE']
